header.title: Topic Preview - jQuery Style Topic Previews Add-On
header.description: Uses jQuery to create a nicer looking Topic Preview with the option to display both the first post and last post of a topic in a single tooltip, and in several themes.
header.author-notes: This add-on uses the jQuery library. It is your responsibility to ensure adding this MOD does not cause any conflicts with other jQuery related MODs on your forum. jQuery should never be included on a page more than once. Styling / Behavior options: You can change the appearance and behavior of the Topic Preview using any of its built-in themes and settings. Search in your styles overall_header.html for .tooltips and you will see available settings for: Themes, Width, Hover Delay Time and Position adjustment.

edit.action: <!-- IF S_VIEWFORUM or S_SHOW_TOPICS --> <link href="{ROOT_PATH}styles/topic_preview/topic_preview.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="screen, projection" /> <!-- ENDIF -->

<!-- IF S_VIEWFORUM or S_SHOW_TOPICS -->
	<script type="text/javascript">
		window.jQuery || document.write(unescape('%3Cscript src="{ROOT_PATH}styles/topic_preview/jquery.min.js" type="text/javascript"%3E%3C/script%3E'));
	</script>
	<script src="{ROOT_PATH}styles/topic_preview/topic_preview.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		$(function(){
			$("dt[title]").topicPreview({
				"style" : "light", //use "light" or "dark" topic preview theme
				"width" : 320, //sets the width of topic previews (in pixels)
				"delay" : 500, //sets the delay before showing topic previews (in milliseconds)
				"left"  : 42 //sets the position offset from the left (in pixels)
			});
		});
	</script>
<!-- ENDIF -->
